Columns.description: The number of columns in a single panel. Usually a multiple of 16

Rows.description: The number of rows in a single panel. Usually a multiple of 16

Chain Length.description: The length of the chain/the number of panels being controlled with 2 being two panels wired in series

Panel Treatment.description:
How to treat panels in a chain. If your chain length is โค1, this has no effect
If not Continuous, all expressions will be cropped if they are greater in width than the number of rows specified above
Continuous: This treats all connected panels as one, long panel
Duplicate: Each panel will display the same image
Mirrored: Each panel will display the same image, but mirrored. This is good if you want to have the images be in the same place on each panel

Remapping.description: The hardware remapping type. If you followed the build guide, leave this one as adafruit-hat

Brightness.description: The brightness of the whole panel. More brightness uses more power

Max Refresh Rate.description: The maximum refresh rate of your panels. Default is 60. Changing this affects speed of animation.

Framerate Fraction.description:
This is how much your animation is slowed down and is calculated through this equation:
